magpie.attributes.expansion

Class CrossExpander

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.attributes.expansion.BaseAttributeExpander
      • magpie.attributes.expansion.CrossExpander
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Options

    public class CrossExpander
extends BaseAttributeExpander
    Creates new attributes as multiplicative cross terms of currently available ones. It automatically generates every possible combination, which may be behavior that could be removed in the future.

    Usage: *No options to set*

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
